label: A6B2C_hP9_150_ef_d_a-001
title: $\beta$-Na$_{2}$ThF$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
When $z_{2} = 1/2$ this transforms into $\delta$-Na$_{2}$ThF$_{6}$ which has the hexagonal \href{current_web_home_dir/A6B2C_hP9_189_fg_c_b-001}{$\beta_{1}$-K$_{2}$UF$_{6}$ structure}. 
 We use the data from (Grzechnik, 2007) taken at 100K and ambient pressure.
